title: Prelude to fractions
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Visual Education Centre, production company

description: Made for the Mathematics Curriculum Committee with the coperation of the staff and pupils of Boroondarra North Primary School. Shows children aged about 10 years in the classroom, playing with blocks and shapes, to learn how parts make up a whole and how this relates to fractions. The narrator is the teacher.
